item.description: The film time is 7:15, so lets gather at 6:45 and head into the theater at 7PM so we can grab some good seats. I will be wearing my movie meetup badge for those who don't know me. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will try to grab a table near the coffee vendor on the second floor. If it is downstairs, I will be waiting inside the ropes near the ticket taker. See you there. The name of the Movie is The Happening Web site: http://www.thehappeningmovie.com/ Studio: 20th Century Fox Director: M. Night Shyamalan Screenwriter: M. Night Shyamalan Starring: Mark Wahlberg, Zooey Deschanel, John Leguizamo, Betty Buckley, Spencer Breslin, Ashlyn Sanchez Plot Summary: A couple goes on the run from an apocalyptic crisis that presents a large-scale threat to humanity. [b]Trailer:[/b]
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing my Boston Meetup Badge. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be inside the ropes near the concession stand. If the movie is upstairs, I will be near the coffee vendor. I will try to snag a table or be standing near by.
item.why: If you like movies and like people who like movies you are going to love our group!
item.name: The Happening
